name: disappearance (Nathan Cleary Music!)
description:
Controls:

WASD - Move

Shift - Run

Q - Lean Left

E - Lean Right

Aim your Crosshair on to a Key to pickup (No button pushes.)

Key 1 - Equip/Put Away Flashlight

Esc - Main Menu

Tab - View Key Inventory

The Project:

disappearance is a project by 'Nathan Cleary Music!' to demonstrate the immersive sound possibilities with Unreal Engine, Wwise and Project Acoustics. 

(This project is still in development based on when there is time to make changes around regular commission work.)

Credits:

Design, Development, Programming & Audio - Nathan Cleary

Henry Jacob - Simon Jackson

Ghost Girl - Lorah

Door Person VO - Andrew Harvey

Monsters VO - Cratchett

Donations:

As this is a ongoing project in which I will be using new technologies to create new audio experience, please feel free to donate and support more development! :)
